1. Digestive Issues:

Remedy: Triphala Churna

  • Triphala is a combination of three fruits (amalaki, bibhitaki, haritaki) known for their digestive benefits.
  • Take 1-2 teaspoons of Triphala powder with warm water before bedtime to promote healthy digestion.

2. Stress and Anxiety:

Remedy: Ashwagandha

  • Ashwagandha is an adaptogenic herb that helps manage stress and anxiety.
  • Consume Ashwagandha powder (1/2 to 1 teaspoon) with warm milk or water before bedtime.

3. Common Cold and Respiratory Issue:

Remedy: Tulsi (Holy Basil) Tea

  • Tulsi has antimicrobial properties and supports respiratory health.
  • Prepare a tea by boiling fresh tulsi leaves in water. Add honey and ginger for additional benefits.

4. Joint Pain/Arthritis:

Remedy: Turmeric Paste

  • Turmeric contains curcumin, known for its anti-inflammatory properties.
  • Mix turmeric powder with warm water or milk to make a paste. Apply on the affected joints or consume internally.

5. Insomnia:

Remedy: Warm Milk with Nutmeg

  • Warm milk has a calming effect, and nutmeg is known for its sleep-inducing properties.
  • Mix a pinch of nutmeg in warm milk and consume before bedtime.
